name: Dungeoneration
description:
Download and play the .exe if the browser version doesn't work.

What do?

- Find the exit in the procedurally generated dungeon only to enter into another one.

- Collect torches to increase the light radius.

- Every level/dungeon is unique and generated by the game.

- Play till you're dead.

Controls:

- Arrow keys/WSAD.

Tools:

- Engine - Unity

- Code Editor - Monodevelop

- Audio - BFXR

- Sprites - Kenney, TheNounProject, wulax
